title: Classical Lie algebras
summary: The classical Lie algebras are finite-dimensional Lie algebras over a field which can be classified into four types A n {\displaystyle A_{n}} , B n {\displaystyle B_{n}} , C n {\displaystyle C_{n}} and D n {\displaystyle D_{n}} , where for g l ( n ) {\displaystyle {\mathfrak {gl}}(n)} the general linear Lie algebra and I n {\displaystyle I_{n}} the n Ã— n {\displaystyle n\times n} identity matrix:
